title: Pikes
content:
Pikes in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Pikes are Two-Handed Martial Weapons in BG3 that boast Extra Reach. They can only two-handed, dealing 1-10 Damage without enchantments. They have a range of 2.5m, and they deal Piercing Damage, though some special Pikes also deal another type of Damage as well.
